Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

resource.description: A dimension can be used to limit the scope of a metric used in a security profile for AWS IoT Device Defender.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: A unique identifier for the dimension.

type.description: A unique identifier for the dimension.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: Specifies the type of the dimension.

type.description: Specifies the type of the dimension.

properties.name: StringValues
properties.description: Specifies the value or list of values for the dimension.

type.description: Specifies the value or list of values for the dimension.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: Metadata that can be used to manage the dimension.

type.description: Metadata that can be used to manage the dimension.

attributes.description: A dimension can be used to limit the scope of a metric used in a security profile for AWS IoT Device Defender.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The ARN (Amazon resource name) of the created dimension.
